instructions: Connect your iPhone to your Mac with a USB cable. Open iTunes (if it didn t open automatically). Find the music you want to transfer over. Click and drag it to the left side of the iTunes window. Drop it on the icon for your phone.

Connect your iPhone. Open iTunes. Click on the iPhone icon near the top of the window. Under Settings in the left pane, click Music . Select Sync Music , then select Selected playlists, artists, albums, and genres . Select the playlist you want to sync.
Connect your iPhone. Open iTunes. Go to the Podcasts view. Click and drag a podcast to your phone in the left pane.

Put all of the photos you want on your iPhone in a single folder. Connect your iPhone. Open iTunes. Click the iPhone icon near the top of the window. Under Settings , click Photos . Check Sync Photos . Select Selected folders . Select the folder you just created. Hit Sync .

Open iBooks. Use File > Add to Library to add your PDF to iBooks. Connect your iPhone. Open iTunes. Click the iPhone icon near the top of the window. Under Settings , click Books . Select Sync Books . Select Selected books . Put a check next to any PDF or ebook you d like to sync to your phone.

Connect your iPhone. Open iTunes. Click the iPhone icon near the top of the window. Under Settings , select Apps . Scroll down to the File Sharing section. Select the app you want to send your file to (such as Pages for Documents or iMovie for video files). Click and drag your file into the list on the right.
